channel.title: papis on Ale's Ecke

item.title: Getting paper references with papis
item.description: Today I would like to talk about how I normally download references of papers using the tool Papis. I will be writing in the future more posts about this tool and about how it makes my life easier. Usually when I am researching a topic and I read a paper about it, I want to check out some references cited in the paper. However, I find it very tiresome to copy the reference or the link (if any is available in the pdf), paste it in the browser and download it with papis.
